original_solution_mapping.L1: Bella eats during the week, 6 apples/day * 7 days/week = <<6*7=42>>42 apples/week
original_solution_mapping.L2: Grace harvests 42 apples/week * 3 = <<42*3=126>>126 apples during the week.
original_solution_mapping.L3: Leftover after Bella eats, 126 apples/week - 42 apples/week = <<126-42=84>>84 apples/week.
original_solution_mapping.L4: After 6 weeks Grace will have 84 apples/week * 6 weeks = <<84*6=504>>504 apples.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 3243.
    Returns: the total number of apples Grace will have after 6 weeks.
    """
    # L1
    bella_apples_per_day = 6 # Bella eats 6 apples a day
    days_per_week = 7 # WK
    bella_apples_per_week = bella_apples_per_day * days_per_week

    # L2
    fraction_consumed_by_bella_denominator = 3 # a third of the apples Grace picks
    grace_apples_per_week = bella_apples_per_week * fraction_consumed_by_bella_denominator

    # L3
    grace_leftover_per_week = grace_apples_per_week - bella_apples_per_week

    # L4
    num_weeks = 6 # after 6 weeks
    total_apples_grace_has = grace_leftover_per_week * num_weeks

    # FA
    answer = total_apples_grace_has
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: Bella eats during the week, {bella_apples_per_day} apples/day * {days_per_week} days/week = <<{bella_apples_per_day}*{days_per_week}={bella_apples_per_week}>>{bella_apples_per_week} apples/week

Grace harvests {bella_apples_per_week} apples/week * {fraction_consumed_by_bella_denominator} = <<{bella_apples_per_week}*{fraction_consumed_by_bella_denominator}={grace_apples_per_week}>>{grace_apples_per_week} apples during the week.

Leftover after Bella eats, {grace_apples_per_week} apples/week - {bella_apples_per_week} apples/week = <<{grace_apples_per_week}-{bella_apples_per_week}={grace_leftover_per_week}>>{grace_leftover_per_week} apples/week.
After {num_weeks} weeks Grace will have {grace_leftover_per_week} apples/week * {num_weeks} weeks = <<{grace_leftover_per_week}*{num_weeks}={total_apples_grace_has}>>{total_apples_grace_has} apples.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: Bella eats during the week, 6 apples/day * 7 days/week = <<6*7=42>>42 apples/week
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: Grace harvests 42 apples/week * 3 = <<42*3=126>>126 apples during the week.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: Leftover after Bella eats, 126 apples/week - 42 apples/week = <<126-42=84>>84 apples/week.

explanation: Incorrect final answer. An intermediate value 'grace_leftover_per_week' (value: 84) was reported instead of 'total_apples_grace_has' (value: 504).
